title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for integral of f(-4)

1 point is earned for value of f(-4)

1 point is earned for integral of f(4)

1 point is earned for antiderivative of f(4)

1 point is earned for value of f(4)

f(−4)=5+ ∫ 0 −4 g(x) dx =5−(8−2π)=2π−3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@53ED@

f(4)=5+ ∫ 0 4 (5 e −x 3 −3)dx =5+(−15 e −x 3 −3x) | x=0 x=4 =8−15 e −4 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6454@
